edu.doane.dugal.dea

Class PRNG

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.doane.dugal.dea.PRNG

  • public class PRNG
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class implementing a pseudo-random number generator, based on the Mersenne Twister generator distributed by CERN in their colt library.
    Version:
    12/10/2014
    Author:
    Mark M. Meysenburg

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PRNG getInstance()
      Get a reference to the one allowed PRNG object.
      int getSeed()
      Get the seed value currently being used by this PRNG.
      double nextDouble()
      Get the next double from the PRNG sequence, in the closed range [0, 1].
      double nextDouble(double lo, double hi)
      Return the next number in the PRNG sequence, as a double in the closed range [lo, hi].
      int nextInt()
      Return the next number in the PRNG sequence, as an int in the closed range [Integer.MIN_VALUE, Integer.MAX_VALUE]
      int nextInt(int lo, int hi)
      Return the next number in the PRNG sequence, as an int in the closed range [lo, hi].
      void setSeed(int seed)
      Re-seed the PRNG with a new value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PRNG getInstance()
        Get a reference to the one allowed PRNG object. The default behavior is to get a PRNG seeded with the system time. If you want to manually set the seed value, call setSeed() after calling this method.
        Returns:
        Reference to the single PRNG object that can exist.

      • nextInt

        public int nextInt()
        Return the next number in the PRNG sequence, as an int in the closed range [Integer.MIN_VALUE, Integer.MAX_VALUE]
        Returns:
        a int in the range [Integer.MIN_VALUE, Integer.MAX_VALUE]

      • nextInt

        public int nextInt(int lo,
                   int hi)
        Return the next number in the PRNG sequence, as an int in the closed range [lo, hi]. It is assumed that lo is less than or equal to hi.
        Parameters:
        lo - Low int of range.
        hi - High int of range.
        Returns:
        a int in the range [lo, hi].

      • nextDouble

        public double nextDouble()
        Get the next double from the PRNG sequence, in the closed range [0, 1].
        Returns:
        a double in the range [0, 1].

      • nextDouble

        public double nextDouble(double lo,
                         double hi)
        Return the next number in the PRNG sequence, as a double in the closed range [lo, hi]. It is assumed that lo is less than or equal to hi.
        Parameters:
        lo - Low value of PRNG's range.
        hi - High value of PRNG's range.
        Returns:
        a double in the range [lo, hi]

      • setSeed

        public void setSeed(int seed)
        Re-seed the PRNG with a new value.
        Parameters:
        seed - New seed value.

      • getSeed

        public int getSeed()
        Get the seed value currently being used by this PRNG.
        Returns:
        Seed value used by this PRNG.
